description: Start this task by the specified entity (or if none specified, by the present task owner).  If an owner is specified, that owner is assigned as the task owner.  The task is transitioned to the In Progress state.
name: Start Task

parameter.documentation: The entity who is to be assigned ownership of this task.  If no entity is provided, the ownership of the task remains unchanged.
parameter.name: owner

text.div:
Start Task

OPERATION: Start Task

Start this task by the specified entity (or if none specified, by the present task owner). If an owner is specified, that owner is assigned as the task owner. The task is transitioned to the In Progress state.

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INowner0..1Reference

The entity who is to be assigned ownership of this task. If no entity is provided, the ownership of the task remains unchanged.
